list_definition.definition: a building containing the arrival and departure areas for passengers at an airport or one in the centre/center of a city or town where passengers can buy tickets for air travel etc and can be transported by bus etc to an airport
a usually large station at either end of a railway/railroad line, or one for long-distance buses
in an electric circuit, a point of connection to a battery etc
a device linked to a computer by which the computer can be operated.
(of an illness etc) in the final stage before death
